name: glass wool mat production, without cullet | glass wool mat | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1570/documentation

Most glass wool is produced with cullet input. This datasets represents a marginal additional production without cullet.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:]

Included processes: melting, fibre forming & collecting, hardening & curing and internal processes (workshop, etc.). Additionally, energy carrier for furnace, packing and infrastructure are included.

The activity ends with the product being ready to be shipped.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2399:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products n.e.c.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The company worked on a very high technical level but the data refer to the situation before 1995. The energy for the melting process is mainly electricity and from natural gas.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see geography and technology This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
